p: The accumulation of dengue cases suggests a propagated outbreak of dengue virus in the population. This can be seen by a steep increase of dengue cases and incremental jumps. The jumps reflect the generation of new cases in the population “ Fig 3”. The two peaks were in April and July. Dengue cases density was higher in the wards that had market places in the Kinondoni municipality ( Fig 2). However, distances from the markets to dengue cases houses were not measured. Manzese ward had the highest number of cases 18, followed by Mwananymala, Tandale and Mabibo that had 13, 13, and 9 cases, respectively.
